reviewText: Got this DVD for my 2 yr. old and 3 yr. old sons.  They love it.  Lots of bright colors, and great stories about friendship - picking a "best friend" (you don't have to pick just one), always including others, and being friendly to those who don't speak the same language.  I think it would be great for young schoolage kids (pre-K or K). Great DVD.
This was a gift to my Grandson.  He was happy to receive it and enjoyes watching and playing the games.  Would recommend this and any other Todd World videos.
